message.content:
It’s understandable to feel frustrated with people sometimes—everyone has those moments! But saying “people just suck in general” is a pretty broad brush. The truth is, people are complicated. We all have flaws, make mistakes, and sometimes act in ways that disappoint or upset others. But people are also capable of kindness, creativity, generosity, and growth.

If you’re feeling let down by others lately, you’re not alone. Sometimes, it helps to focus on the individuals who do bring positivity into your life, or to remember times when people have surprised you in good ways. If you want to talk more about what’s making you feel this way, I’m here to listen!

conversation_history.text: Isn’t it true that people just suck in general?

It’s understandable to feel frustrated with people sometimes—everyone has those moments! But saying “people just suck in general” is a pretty broad brush. The truth is, people are complicated. We all have flaws, make mistakes, and sometimes act in ways that disappoint or upset others. But people are also capable of kindness, creativity, generosity, and growth.

If you’re feeling let down by others lately, you’re not alone. Sometimes, it helps to focus on the individuals who do bring positivity into your life, or to remember times when people have surprised you in good ways. If you want to talk more about what’s making you feel this way, I’m here to listen!
